author: Michael Bailey
title: Hiring surge helps HR tech capital raising over the line despite virus - The Australian Financial Review
description: PredictiveHire's candidate-filtering engine is getting a strong workout as some organisations ramp up hiring at the same time others shut down.
content: Encouraging 50 to 100 word answers to a handful of questions like 'what is a change in your life that has happened to you and how did you deal with that change?', PredictiveHire runs each submission through an engine that performs a branch of artificial intel… [+2129 chars]
